General.Name: Jiangsu Yangnong Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Yangnong Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of pesticides in China. It offers herbicides, fungicides, plant growth regulators, etc. The company exports its products. Jiangsu Yangnong Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Shen  Yang
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Marketing Mang.
